p: A small positive effect of gene flow, independent of climatic differences, is supported by analyses of some lifestage components (Fig. 4C; Table S4C). Negative effects of precipitation and temperature differences were similar to those found in the analyses of climatic drivers of performance, while gene flow (i.e., being from a between‐population vs. a within‐population cross) had a positive effect on fruit production and a marginal positive effect on seed production.
